product_name: The North Face Kilowatt Shorts - Men's
long_description: Built with abrasion-resistant fabric and stretegic stretch paneling, The North Face Kilowatt Shorts for men will be your go-to pair of shorts for long runs and tough workouts. Abrasion-resistant fabric is engineered for a complete range of motion; secure side pocket features a port for your media player. Mesh ventilation panels enhance comfort. The North Face Kilowatt Shorts for men move with you during activity and feature a 10.5 in. inseam. Part of The North Face Mountain Athletic line of technical clothing and footwear built to withstand the rigors of sport-specific training by outdoor athletes.
short_description: Built with abrasion-resistant fabric and stretegic stretch paneling, The North Face Kilowatt Shorts for men will be your go-to pair of shorts for long runs and tough workouts.
